title: Circular Economy & Reuse
description: Complete material recovery and circular flows create self-sustaining operations with zero waste

items.title: Energy Self-Sufficiency
items.description: Integrated heat recovery achieves thermal self-sufficiency through cascading energy use.
details: Excess heat dries incoming litter to <15% moisture

items.title: Biochar Returns to Farm
items.description: Biochar produced from waste returns to poultry houses as bedding additive, closing the loop.
details: Chickens consume some, improving gut health
Enhanced litter eligible for NRCS grants

items.title: Complete Nutrient Cycling
items.description: All nutrients recovered and returned to agricultural use in optimized forms.

items.title: Synergistic Integration
items.description: Components work together to create benefits exceeding sum of parts.
details: Heat from one process powers another
Each waste stream becomes another's input
System-level optimization impossible with standalone units

items.title: Zero Waste Operations
items.description: Every input completely utilized with no disposal requirements or environmental releases.

items.title: Scalable Model
items.description: System scales from individual farms to centralized regional facilities.
